===Etymology===
It was said that [[w:Red Hare|Red Hare]] ([[w:Lü Bu|Lü Bu]]'s horse) could travel 1000 [[w:li (unit)|li]] in a single day (during the [[w:Three Kingdoms|Three Kingdoms]] period, 1000 [[w:li (unit)|li]] would have equated to roughly 415.8 km or 258.2118 miles)
